Sequence Information.Source: Lactobacillus johnsonii (strain CNCM I-12250 / La1 / NCC 533) (Gram-positive bacteria)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Heat stable bacteriocin. peptides for activity lafA and lafX. Associated with a 180 kDa bacteriocin complex.

Literature.Title: Purification and partial characterization of lactacin F, a bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus acidophilus 11088.
Literature.Author: Fremaux C, Ahn C, Klaenhammer TR.

Literature.Title: The genome sequence of the probiotic intestinal bacterium Lactobacillus johnsonii NCC 533.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2004 Feb 24;101(8)2512-2517.
Literature.Author: Pridmore RD, Berger B, Desiere F, Vilanova D, Barretto C, Pittet AC, Zwahlen MC, Rouvet M, Altermann E, Barrangou R, Mollet B, Mercenier A, Klaenhammer T, Arigoni F, Schell MA.

Literature.Title: Cloning, phenotypic expression, and DNA sequence of the gene for lactacin F, an antimicrobial peptide produced by Lactobacillus spp.
Literature.Author: Klaenhammer T.R.,Muriana P.M.

Literature.Title: Molecular analysis of the lactacin F operon.
Literature.Author: Klaenhammer T.R.,Ahn C.,Fremaux C.
